Package org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.datamodel

Class VLVIndexDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.datamodel.AbstractIndexDescriptor
      • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.datamodel.VLVIndexDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<AbstractIndexDescriptor>
    public class VLVIndexDescriptor
extends AbstractIndexDescriptor
    The class used to describe the VLV index configuration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VLVIndexDescriptor

        public VLVIndexDescriptor​(String name,
                          BackendDescriptor backend,
                          DN baseDN,
                          SearchScope scope,
                          String filter,
                          List<VLVSortOrder> sortOrder)
        Constructor for the VLVIndexDescriptor.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the index.
        backend - the backend where the index is defined.
        baseDN - the baseDN of the search indexed by the VLV index.
        scope - the scope of the search indexed by the VLV index.
        filter - the filter or the search indexed by the VLV index.
        sortOrder - the sort order list of the VLV index.
